about_the_game:
What's Inside:
Retro Drive Art: Dive deeper into the synthwave universe with a collection of concept art, banners, in-game sprites and illustrations that inspired Retro Drive's art.

Cinematic Screenshots: High-resolution screenshots capture the aesthetic of the game's vibrant landscapes, allowing you to capture Retro Drive's levels in a cinematic light.

Video Screensavers: Let the calming ambience of Retropolis and retro-futuristic visuals transport you back to the neon-soaked streets of the '80s.


Detailed contents:
  • Official box art of the game (PNG, JPG)
  • Character sprite pack with Christmas variations (PNG)
  • Logo concept art (JPG, PSD)
  • Legacy box & studio art (PNG, PSD)
  • 17 vibrant cinematic screenshots (PNG)
  • Parody VHS tape sprites (PNG)
  • 5 video wallpapers (MP4)



Note - Cinematic Pack contents can be found at:
Steam\steamapps\common\Retro Drive: Revamped\RDR Cinematic Pack

The easiest way to navigate to this is to right click Retro Drive: Revamped in your Steam library and go to:
Manage -> Browse local files
